description: This is a Node.js script that sets up a minimal Express server to serve static files from a 'public/' directory and provides health check endpoints ('/healthz.html' and '/healthz') for use in CI environments. It configures server parameters via environment variables and handles graceful shutdown signals.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Initializes and starts the static file server, sets up health check endpoints, and handles shutdown signals.

methods.name: sendHealth
methods.description: Sends a health response ('OK') in HTML or plain text, with cache headers to prevent caching.

methods.name: shutdown
methods.description: Handles graceful shutdown of the server upon receiving termination signals.
